item.title: West Bengal background
item.description: Task Aggregate data on West Bengal Data Sourced from Wikipedia and Wikimedia commons Electoral calendar Table 1: Election calendar date kind house body 2021 national upper NA 2021 state vidhan sabha NA 2024 national lower NA Other information R packages used include magick1, rsvg2, rvest3, and, kableExtra4.
